design_philosophy.visual_style: Clean grids, bold typography, organic tech shapes, high contrast

marketing.hero_style: Split layout: Left text (60%), Right visual (40%) with floating elements

admin.card_style: bg-white border border-slate-100 shadow-sm rounded-xl p-6

buttons.primary: bg-[#5B5BF7] hover:bg-[#4A4AE0] text-white rounded-full px-8 py-6 font-semibold shadow-lg shadow-blue-500/20 transition-all hover:-translate-y-1
buttons.secondary: bg-white border-2 border-slate-200 text-slate-900 hover:border-[#5B5BF7] hover:text-[#5B5BF7] rounded-full px-8 py-6 font-semibold transition-all
buttons.ghost: text-slate-600 hover:text-[#5B5BF7] hover:bg-blue-50 rounded-lg px-4 py-2

cards.course: group relative bg-white rounded-2xl border border-slate-100 overflow-hidden hover:shadow-xl hover:shadow-blue-500/5 transition-all duration-300
cards.feature: bg-slate-50 rounded-2xl p-8 hover:bg-white hover:shadow-lg transition-all border border-transparent hover:border-slate-100

inputs.style: h-12 rounded-lg border-slate-200 focus:border-[#5B5BF7] focus:ring-[#5B5BF7] bg-white

language_switcher.style: flex items-center gap-2 px-3 py-1.5 rounded-full bg-slate-100 hover:bg-slate-200 text-sm font-medium transition-colors cursor-pointer
language_switcher.behavior: Dropdown or Toggle. Must persist selection.

localization_rules.implementation: Use a React Context or simple state lifted to App.js to switch content. All static text must be in a translation object/file.

universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs (e.g., py-24 instead of py-12).
Every interaction needs a micro-animation (hover, focus, active).
All interactive elements must have data-testid attributes.
Do not use generic 'Lorem Ipsum'. Use realistic educational content.
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Install 'lucide-react', 'framer-motion', 'clsx', 'tailwind-merge'. 2. Setup the Tailwind config with the colors provided. 3. Create the 'Layout' component that handles the Header (with Language Switcher) and Footer. 4. Build the Home page using the 'Bento' grid for the 'Why Novatech' section. 5. Ensure the Admin Dashboard is a separate layout route.
